comments:
Driver:  RC5

Tomcat 4.0.4 with JDK 1.3.1_17

When going through a bottom-up scenario with a started Tomcat 4.0 server, I got the error:

Error in deploying to Axis.

If I retry on Tomcat 4.0.4 with JDK 1.4.2_09, then the Sample JSP does not come up.

Running bottom-up on Tomcat 4.0 with JDK 1.4.2_09:

The requested resource (/tc40Client/sampleAddressBookProxy/TestClient.jsp) is not available.

Restart Tomcat 4.0, then this error occurs:

org.apache.jasper.JasperException: Unable to compile class for JSPNote: sun.tools.javac.Main has been deprecated.

D:\rad\rad7_1213_workspace1216a\.metadata\.plugins\org.eclipse.wst.server.core\tmp0\work\Standalone\localhost\tc40Client\sampleAddressBookProxy\TestClient$jsp.java:9: Superclass org.apache.jsp.HttpJspBase of class org.apache.jsp.TestClient$jsp not found.
public class TestClient$jsp extends HttpJspBase {
                                    ^

Running bottom-up on Tomcat 4.0 with JDK 1.3.1:


[ERROR] EngineConfigurationFactoryServlet - Unable to find config file.  Creating new servlet engine config file: /WEB-INF/server-config.wsdd

IWAB0489E Error when deploying Web service to Axis runtime
  axis-admin failed with  {http://xml.apache.org/axis/}HTTP (500)Internal Server Error

The server-config.wsdd file was not created on the server temporary publish directory either.

With WTP 1.0.1 M200601170000 and the fix for bug 119954, I can now create a Web service successfully with Tomcat 4.0.4 or Tomcat 4.0.6 when configuring Tomcat with JDK 1.4.2_09.  However, I still have Axis deploy problem when running Tomcat with JDK 1.3.1.  The server console log indicates:

[ERROR] EngineConfigurationFactoryServlet - Unable to find config file.  Creating new servlet engine config file: /WEB-INF/server-config.wsdd

and the server-config.wsdd file was not created in the .metadata directory.  I'm able to run a servlet on the same Tomcat 4.0 server though.
Creating Axis1 Web service on Tomcat 4.0.6 works fine with JDK 1.4.2_09 for both WTP 2.0.2 and WTP 3.0.
